attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that the health of any aspiring immigrant is fully checked, at his/her own expense, in their home country  by UK doctors based there and that they are only to be allowed to enter the UK if they are confirmed not to be suffering from any form of illness or disease.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The health of the indigenous population of the UK is under threat from imported life-threatening diseases.  Other civilised countries deny access to anybody suffering illnesses such as TB or HIV.  Why is it not possible to impose the same restrictions on people wishing to emigrate to the UK
